Get Started¶

Installation¶

sfqlib is developed in python2. Although the code may run with python3 as well, it has not been tested on python3.

To install with pip.

pip install sfqlib

For the latest release, use the wheel on Github instead.

Overview¶

For a background of the project, please refer to this white paper.

The sfqlib currently offers three features.

  1. Construction and application of Time evolution operator.
  2. Euler angle decomposition for spine-\(\frac{1}{2}\) rotation.
  3. Visualization of the qubit.

The qubit classes are ordered as the following.
